IRS990.MissionDesc: THE PRIMARY MISSION OF ALABAMA POLICY INSTITUTE, INC. IS TO PROVIDE INFORMATION TO THE PEOPLE OF ALABAMA ABOUT THE LEGISLATIVE ISSUES BEING DEBATED IN MONTGOMERY AND WASHINGTON, D.C., AND TO BE A RELIABLE RESOURCE TO OUR ELECTED REPRESENTATIVES ON PUBLIC POLICY ISSUES
IRS990.Desc: INFLUENCING PUBLIC POLICY IN THE INTEREST OF THE PRESERVATION OF FREE MARKETS, LIMITED GOVERNMENT AND STRONG FAMILIES, WHICH ARE INDISPENSABLE TO A PROSPEROUS SOCIETY, BY IDENTIFYING, DEVELOPING, AND PROMOTING INNOVATIVE POLICY IDEAS AND BY PROVIDING FACT-BASED, OBJECTIVE ANALYSIS OF KEY ISSUES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION HAS ADOPTED THE PROVISIONS OF FASB ASC (ACCOUNTING STANDARDS CODIFICATION) NO. 740, ACCOUNTING FOR UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES. AS A RESULT OF THE IMPLEMENTATION OF ASC NO. 740, THE ORGANIZATION HAS NOT RECOGNIZED ANY RESPECTIVE LIABILITY FOR UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS AS IT HAS NO KNOWN TAX POSITIONS THAT WOULD SUBJECT THE ORGANIZATION TO ANY MATERIAL INCOME TAX EXPOSURE. THE TAX YEARS THAT REMAIN SUBJECT TO EXAMINATION ARE THE YEARS ENDED JUNE 30, 2014 THROUGH 2017 FOR ALL MAJOR TAX JURISDICTIONS.
FUNDRAISING EXPENSES NETTED AGAINST FUNDRAISING REVENUE 98,610.
FUNDRAISING EXPENSES NETTED AGAINST FUNDRAISING REVENUE 98,610.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11: FORM 990 IS MADE AVAILABLE TO THE BOARD FOR REVIEW PRIOR TO ITS FILING EACH YEAR. THE EXECUTIVE VICE PRESIDENT IS RESPONSIBLE FOR SIGNING AND FILING THE FORM 990 EACH YEAR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION HAS AN EMPLOYEE HANDBOOK THAT SPELLS OUT THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND WHAT THE EMPLOYEE REQUIREMENTS ARE IN RELATION TO THAT POLICY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION HAS A COMPENSATION REVIEW COMMITTEE THAT REVIEWS ANNUALLY THE COMPENSATION OF THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR, OFFICERS AND KEY EMPLOYEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 18
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION IS OPEN FROM 8:00 A.M. TO 5:00 P.M. MONDAY THROUGH FRIDAY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS FINANCIAL DOCUMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OVERSEES THE AUDIT OF THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND THE SELECTION OF AN INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT THAT AUDITS THE STATEMENTS.
